definition: to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
hundred knots of worry in one's intestines (idiom); weighed down with anxiety

sentences.english: Ask you how much sorrows can there be?
The gentle wind, blowing open your petty brow tight, so fly back all the worry.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕的風，吹開你緊瑣的眉頭，讓所有的愁向後飛去。

sentences.english: Here we get to eat as much as we want, and the men don't bother us!
sentences.chinese: 我們不愁喫不愁穿，又沒有臭男人擺架子。

sentences.english: We always have time enough , if we will but use it aright .
sentences.chinese: 只要我們能善用時間，就永遠不愁時間不夠用。

sentences.english: I am just worrying about the working capital.
sentences.chinese: 我還正爲週轉資金髮愁哪。

sentences.english: We always have time enough, if we will but use it alright.
sentences.chinese: 只要我們能善用時間，就永遠不愁時間不夠用。

sentences.english: However, I have a barn full of animals that supply me with all the food I need.
sentences.chinese: 但我得穀倉裏注滿了動物，讓我喫喝不用愁。

sentences.english: Did not know what it's like to worry about.
sentences.chinese: 以前不知道愁是什麼滋味。

sentences.english: Mark is really sitting pretty with his new job.
sentences.chinese: 馬克的新工作使他的生活喫喝不愁。

sentences.english: Japan will never be over, the night cool worry more.
sentences.chinese: 日永不可過，夜涼愁更多。

sentences.english: I have a bright eyes, see flower see sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我有明眸，不見花開只見愁。

sentences.english: Who Deserted in the ancient shore, wild water clouds everywhere worry.
sentences.chinese: 荒村古岸誰家在，野水浮雲處處愁。

sentences.english: The five lakes tour, the worry everywhere, Floating and sinking through the ages, and who asked the east?
sentences.chinese: 落日五湖遊，煙波處處愁。浮沈千古事，誰與問東流？

sentences.english: The gentle wind, blowing open the tight Suo your brow, so that all the worry and flew back.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕的風，吹開你緊瑣的眉頭，讓所有的愁向後飛去。

sentences.english: Under the Eagles worry stream, water flowing into the Northeast Cape Bay.
sentences.chinese: 下爲鷹愁澗，水東北流入鶴灣。

sentences.english: Tears of worry about passing the year, yellow wine, respect the old neighborhood church.
sentences.chinese: 不愁過客當年淚，尊酒黃堂是舊隣。

definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
late at night/in the dead of night
hundred knots of worry in one's intestines (idiom); weighed down with anxiety
